title: RANKED GAME DC 10/05/2015 5.50PM
body: Two people from my ranked game just got dc and we cannot reconnect. Loss forgiven???

replies.body:
just happened here
all 10 afk no match record wtf

Well, two people leaving a single game hardly seems to call for loss forgiven to be enabled.

You do know that loss forgiven is sever-wide, right, and not just per game?
